content: jump start your valentine s day crocheting with this sweet crochet heart pattern taking only 5 minutes to make and using less than one yard of yarn these little hearts will not only motivate you but they will make the perfect embellishment to nearly any project i started my valentine s day crochet designs with this little sweet heart and it inspired me to create 4 more patterns crochet hearts are not just for valentine s day either they are perfect for embellishing a handmade project for that sweet little girl in your life headbands handbags cardigans hats i can t wait to see what you all come up with this pattern and video tutorial is easy enough for a beginner to follow it s actually a great first project because they are so quick and easy to make
